dapps.name: V
about: V returns the internet to its original vision of unrestricted communication and freedom. Users can share posts, V-stacks and polls on-chain, creating a space where users can freely express, connect, and interact.
update:
- Send and receive payments directly in the app
- React to posts and comments with emojis!
- V tags - A new way to explore and engage with content.
- New Trending Subvs section for discovering popular content
- Notification Center added for real-time updates
- Improved navigation & mobile responsiveness
